title: String Reversal and Palindrome Checker
description: Write a program that takes a string input from the user, reverses the string, and checks if the original string is a palindrome. A palindrome is a word, phrase, number, or other sequence of characters that reads the same forward and backward (ignoring spaces, punctuation, and capitalization).
sample_output: The reversed string is: madam. The original string is a palindrome.
